alert.note: Alert for Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:27PM CDT until August 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HUTCHINSON AND NORTHWESTERN ROBERTS COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles northwest of Codman, or 21 miles north of Pampa, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Hutchinson and northwestern Roberts Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
